name: be.omi.icalendareventtoactions
description: This tool allows to store string command line at specific date. When we approche the event it is push to be added to a more precise Clock. At load or on request the toolbox load the list of event based on date. It store the incoming in a list to check every n seconds. When we arrive to the incoming time, it push out the action and the requested date to be manage by an other tool that execute at precise time better.
